metaTitle: CUSTOM HOMES 2 Orihuela Costa | Luxury Villas from €1,600,000
metaDescription: Discover CUSTOM HOMES 2 by ROYAL PARK in La Zenia, Orihuela Costa. Luxury 4-bed villas from €1,600,000. Delivered December 2025. Invest in Costa Blanca's most sought-after location.

content.heroIntro: CUSTOM HOMES 2 represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a luxury 4-bedroom villa in the heart of La Zenia, one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations. Developed by ROYAL PARK, a trusted name in Spanish property development, this exclusive project delivers sophisticated Mediterranean living with modern amenities and timeless design. Each villa spans 350m² of meticulously designed living space set on generous 580m² plots, offering the perfect balance between contemporary comfort and outdoor relaxation. Located minutes from world-class golf courses, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and comprehensive amenities, CUSTOM HOMES 2 caters to discerning buyers seeking both lifestyle quality and investment potential. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2025, this is your chance to secure a premium property in Orihuela Costa at 35% less than comparable Costa Blanca North developments. The strong international community—particularly British, Scandinavian, and Dutch residents—ensures a welcoming environment where English is widely spoken and comprehensive services cater to expatriate lifestyles.

locationSection.intro: La Zenia stands as Costa Blanca's premier residential enclave, renowned for its sophisticated cosmopolitan character and unparalleled lifestyle offerings. Nestled in Orihuela Costa within Alicante province, this sought-after location combines established infrastructure with natural beauty. The area is characterized by tree-lined avenues, world-class sporting facilities, and proximity to both pristine Mediterranean beaches and championship golf courses. La Zenia has evolved into a thriving hub where international communities flourish, supported by excellent healthcare facilities including Hospital de Torrevieja just 15 minutes away. The neighborhood boasts La Zenia Boulevard, one of Spain's largest shopping centers, alongside boutique retailers, gourmet restaurants, and vibrant social venues. This is where discerning investors and lifestyle seekers converge—a place where property values consistently appreciate while quality of life remains paramount.
highlights: Beach: La Zenia Blue Flag Beach - 10 minutes
Golf: Villamartín Championship Course - on doorstep
Restaurants: Gourmet venues in La Zenia - 5-10 minutes
Schools: El Limonar - 15 minutes, Kings College Murcia - 40 minutes
Supermarkets: Mercadona, Consum, Lidl - within walking distance

propertyFeatures.intro: CUSTOM HOMES 2 villas exemplify contemporary European construction standards with premium materials and finishes throughout. ROYAL PARK has engineered these properties to maximize comfort, efficiency, and aesthetic appeal. Each villa features thoughtfully designed floor plans that optimize living spaces, abundant natural light, and seamless indoor-outdoor transitions. Advanced building techniques ensure thermal efficiency, structural integrity, and longevity. The finishes reflect a commitment to quality—from premium kitchen installations to luxury bathroom fixtures—creating homes that exceed expectations of even the most demanding buyers. These are not simply houses; they are carefully crafted sanctuaries designed for modern Mediterranean living.
features: Private swimming pool with heating system
Fully fitted kitchen with premium appliances
Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Modern luxury bathroom fixtures and fittings

content.investmentSection: Orihuela Costa represents one of Costa Blanca's most compelling investment opportunities, with property values demonstrating consistent +10% year-on-year appreciation. CUSTOM HOMES 2 enters a market demonstrating robust fundamentals: strong international demand, limited luxury supply, and rising rental income potential. Properties in this segment command €800+ per week in short-term rental markets, delivering attractive yields for investor-owners. Positioned 35% below comparable Costa Blanca North properties, La Zenia offers exceptional value without compromising location quality or amenities. The demographic profile—affluent international residents, retirees, and lifestyle investors—ensures sustained demand. Market analysts project continued appreciation as infrastructure improvements and international recognition drive further investment. ROYAL PARK's reputation and December 2025 delivery timeline position CUSTOM HOMES 2 as a strategic acquisition for those seeking both immediate lifestyle benefits and long-term capital appreciation.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in CUSTOM HOMES 2?
faqs.answer: Properties in CUSTOM HOMES 2 start from €1,600,000. This price includes 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom luxury villas with 350m² of living space and 580m² plots. Currently 1 unit is available. Contact us for detailed pricing information and available inventory.

faqs.question: When will CUSTOM HOMES 2 be completed?
faqs.answer: CUSTOM HOMES 2 is scheduled for completion on December 1st, 2025. ROYAL PARK provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. For specific delivery timelines and construction updates, please contact our sales team.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of CUSTOM HOMES 2?
faqs.answer: ROYAL PARK is the developer of CUSTOM HOMES 2. They have established themselves as a trusted builder in Orihuela Costa and surrounding areas, known for quality construction, attention to detail, and reliable project delivery. Their portfolio demonstrates consistent commitment to buyer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Orihuela Costa a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Orihuela Costa is an excellent investment location with +10% year-on-year property appreciation. It features strong British, Scandinavian, and Dutch communities where English is widely spoken. Outstanding amenities include Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes), La Zenia Blue Flag Beach (10 minutes), Villamartín Golf Course nearby, and La Zenia Boulevard shopping center. The area offers exceptional lifestyle quality at 35% lower prices than Costa Blanca North.

faqs.question: How far is CUSTOM HOMES 2 from the beach?
faqs.answer: CUSTOM HOMES 2 is just 10 minutes from La Zenia Blue Flag Beach, one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious and cleanest beaches. Additional beaches including Campoamor and Cabo Roig are within 15-20 minutes, offering diverse coastal options for families and water sports enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What amenities are near CUSTOM HOMES 2?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona and Consum supermarkets (walking distance), La Zenia Boulevard shopping center (5 minutes), Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes), Villamartín Golf Course (on doorstep), El Limonar School (15 minutes), numerous restaurants and cafes, and pristine Blue Flag beaches within 10 minutes. All essential services and lifestyle amenities are conveniently accessible.

faqs.question: Is there a swimming pool at CUSTOM HOMES 2?
faqs.answer: Yes, each villa at CUSTOM HOMES 2 features a private swimming pool with heating system, perfect for year-round enjoyment of Mediterranean climate. The pools are designed to enhance outdoor entertaining space and add significant lifestyle and investment value.

faqs.question: What is the rental income potential for CUSTOM HOMES 2?
faqs.answer: Properties in this location command approximately €800+ per week in short-term holiday rental markets. Long-term rental potential is also strong given Orihuela Costa's appeal to international residents. The combination of luxury specifications, location, and amenities makes CUSTOM HOMES 2 an attractive investment for owner-occupied or income-generating purposes.

content.conclusion: CUSTOM HOMES 2 by ROYAL PARK represents a rare convergence of exceptional value, superior location, and investment potential. These 4-bedroom luxury villas in La Zenia offer discerning buyers an opportunity to acquire a premium Mediterranean home at prices 35% below comparable Costa Blanca properties. With completion approaching in December 2025, the time to secure your dream property is now. Whether you're seeking a personal residence, family retreat, or investment asset, CUSTOM HOMES 2 delivers on all fronts: established expatriate communities, world-class golf and beaches, comprehensive healthcare, excellent shopping, and proven appreciation potential. Don't let this opportunity pass. Contact our team today via WhatsApp for detailed information, virtual tours, and exclusive viewing arrangements. Your Costa Blanca dream awaits at CUSTOM HOMES 2.
